name: E-smart
tagline: CI3540 Web Based Enterprise Services - Ecommerce store
body:
# CI3540 - Web Based Enterprise: E-commerce Shop  

## David Patterson 

As a requirement of CI3540 it was required for me to create a simple E-commerce shop. 


`$ git clone https://github.com/k0954342/E-Smart.git`

`$ cd MIUK_Portal`

`$ bundle install`

`$ rake db:reset`

`$ rails s`

### Technologies: Ruby on Rails | HTML5 | CSS3 | Jquery |

### Access via: http://e-smart.herokuapp.com

### Login Details: 
User: dpatterson2008@hotmail.com

Pass: Clyde_01
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
